edu.northwestern.jcr.adapter.xtf.query
Class NSRegistryBasedNamespaceMappings

java.lang.Object
  edu.northwestern.jcr.adapter.xtf.query.NSRegistryBasedNamespaceMappings
All Implemented Interfaces:
NamespaceMappings, org.apache.jackrabbit.spi.commons.namespace.NamespaceResolver
public class NSRegistryBasedNamespaceMappings
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.apache.jackrabbit.spi.commons.namespace.NamespaceResolver, NamespaceMappings

NSRegistryBasedNamespaceMappings implements a namespace mapping based on the stable index prefix provided by the namespace registry.
